contextId.occurrenceNote: This contrast probably refers to rich people and poor people. Alternate translation: "you rich people who ride on white donkeys ... you poor people who walk along the road" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: you who ride on white donkeys ... you who walk along the road

contextId.occurrenceNote: This emphasizes that it would be for his entire life. Alternate translation: "all his life" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: from the time he is in your womb until the day of his death

contextId.occurrenceNote: This refers to the land as a whole. Alternate translation: "from all the eleven tribes" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
